snippet: The United States Soccer Federation has instituted a policy that requires players on a national team to "stand respectfully" during national anthems, the New York Times and other media reported on Saturday....

headline.main: Australia's Felton Wins NZ PGA in Playoff
headline.print_headline: Australia's Felton Wins NZ PGA in Playoff

lead_paragraph: The United States Soccer Federation has instituted a policy that requires players on a national team to "stand respectfully" during national anthems, the New York Times and other media reported on Saturday.
